title: Grzegorz Orzechowski
text:
Sustainable Mechatronics
Located at LUT Lahti. The only mechanical engineering outpost of LUT. Custom designs, industrial applications, virtual engineering, and value offer via operational digital twins.
We develop simulation and digital twin methods for autonomous and human-aware machinery, including:

multibody and hydraulic system modeling
sim-to-real workflows
data-driven surrogate models
human/environment modeling for safety

Selected domains: logistics, healthcare, forestry, construction, non-road mobile machinery.

title: Grzegorz Orzechowski
text:
Associate Professor (Tenure Track), LUT University
Lahti / Lappeenranta · Finland
Email: grzegorz.orzechowski@lut.fi · Phone: +358 50 431 0717

title: Grzegorz Orzechowski
text:
About
I work on multibody simulations, digital twins, and robotics with focus on sim-to-real transfer for non-road mobile machinery.
Current interests:

Autonomous machinery
ML for mechanical systems
Digital twins

title: Grzegorz Orzechowski
text:
Research
Core areas

Multibody dynamics & flexible multibody simulation
Digital twins for machinery and robotics
Sim-to-real workflows and data-driven modeling

Sustainable Mechatronics @ LUT Lahti
